actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals an itemized deduction for losses incurred in the sale or exchange of certain principal residences.

summary.text: Permits individuals an itemized tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 for losses incurred in the sale or exchange of principal residences owned and used by the taxpayer for periods aggregating 5 years out of the 8 years preceding the sale.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals an itemized deduction for losses incurred in the sale or exchange of certain principal residences.
